short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that saves conversations with Claude to gists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Anthropic Claude messages to GitHub Gists with a click of a button.  

New in v1.5: This extension now also saves text artifacts and attachments!

New in v1.7: Added button so you can also copy the conversation (in a markdown format) to the clipboard.

Usage:

If you want to allow the extension to automatically save to GitHub gists, after installing the extension, click on your extension manager on the upper right hand side of chrome,  and add a GitHub personal access token (PAT) scoped to gists.  

GitHub: https://github.com/hamelsmu/claudesave
